      • setDisplayCorrectAnswerForResults

        public void setDisplayCorrectAnswerForResults(boolean displayCorrectAnswer)
        If true, shows correct answer and green background whether or not supplied answer is correct. This is intended for use with mouse rollovers to temporarily display the correct answer
